ygData.subject: RE: PoF pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not sure i understand what you are asking... If you get into a situation where autopull is happening cazic can be on the other side of the zone and will
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:13 PM 12/16/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Thu, 16 Dec 1999, J.R. Hyde wrote:
>>
>> Well thats my point, once cazic learns you are in the pof, he starts willy
>> nilly zapping people. The trick is to not let him know you are the in the
>> zone, and that means being very carefull about not creating situations
>> where autopull happens and letting mobs get away that know you are in the
>zone.
>
>Does he do it before all other tactics when you're fighting
>him?
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>

Not sure i understand what you are asking... If you get into a situation
where autopull is happening cazic can be on the other side of the zone and
will just start DTing people. Since just about everybody interacts with
everybody else in one shape or fashion everybody is on his agro list then.
You have to gate out or just wait for your turn on the list then (or camp
out) to clear agro. Now after the zone is completly cleared of everything
but cazic and everybody makes their rush at him he will continue to DT
people and pets while fighting him. I have had this melee DT punch right
through my necromancer's harmshield, so i have no clue how you could do a
fight against cazic and suffer NO casulties.
